name: 01-guidelines
description: 1. install required packages     * `npm install -S langchain`     * `npm i dotenv`     * `npm i --save-dev @types/node` 2. `tsc --init`     * open `tsconfig.json` file and update     ```     {     "compilerOptions": {         ...         "target": "ES2017", // or higher         "module": "nodenext",     }     }     ```
